attributes.action: The UK government should deny Donald Trump the platform of parliamentary address
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump's well documented misogyny, racism and vulgarity disqualifies him from being accorded the platform of a parliamentary address. Therefore during his official State Visit to the United Kingdom he should not be allowed to address either house.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, but he should not be allowed to address the houses of Parliament as it would give a platform and affirmation to his racist, protectionist and bullying policies.
